Name: Erika
Message: Your current equipment isn’t doing you or your abilities justice, <YellowBold>[player]</>.
I hear the Shop has great items in stock.
Your equipment looks like it needs a boost in power.
Head over to the Forge and “level up” your equipment.
Runes are full of untapped potential.
You can imprint runes in the Rune menu.
Collect Monster Cores and complete Codices to become stronger.
The Monster Codex menu is found under Challenges.
Make sure you complete as many as you can!
Elixirs are mystical potions that boost your strength.
You can brew elixirs in the Elixir menu.
Complete achievements to gain stats.
<YellowBold>[player]</>, your achievement progress can be found under Challenges > Achievements.
Soul Crystals imbue equipment with power.
You can equip them in the Items menu.
Why don’t you give it a try?
Hone your skills for a better chance of survival in battle.
You can level up skills in the Skill menu.
Honor is bestowed upon the worthy and the skilled.
Earn Honor by participating in Arena Battles in the Battlefield menu.
How about a new challenge to spice up your adventures?
Let’s take a trip to the Tower of Insolence! The powerful monsters in the Tower of Insolence will be a good challenge for you, <YellowBold>[player]</>!
I’m sure the items you get there would be a great help, <YellowBold>[player]</>.
Am I the only one who thinks you look bored, <YellowBold>[player]</>?
What about checking out Daily Dungeons to face off against powerful bosses?
I’m sure the materials and Exp. would be a great help to you, <YellowBold>[player]</>!
Nothing beats a battle that no one can guess the outcome of!
<YellowBold>[player]</>, build your fame by fighting lots of other players!
How about a new task to spice up your adventures?
Journey across the continent and complete Daily Quests!
I’m sure the items you get from Daily Quests would be a great help to you, <YellowBold>[player]</>.
Participate in boss battles to fight monsters and acquire Cores!
I’m sure the items you get from Weekly Quest would be a great help to you, <YellowBold>[player]</>.
Have you ever thought about joining up with other players to battle powerful monsters?
Powerful monsters and rare rewards... A place for you and your allies...
Team up with allies and complete quests in Elite Dungeons to have never-before-seen adventures!
How about taking a break to recover from your adventures?
Extract herbs from the scenic Extraction Pit!
Gather herbs now and use them later!
Countless monsters await your challenge in the Trials of Experience, <YellowBold>[player]</>.
<YellowBold>[player]</>, you’ll become stronger than you can imagine by fighting monsters!
